item.title: Quests and current developmant/information
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

Arsonist:

I don’t mean to discourage but I’ve either finished or almost finished coding 80% of the RSC quests.Also I think more important than the quests are the fail rates for skills, and of course, combat formulae. These things don’t require coding skills but have been neglected by those trying to replicate RSC imo. GOod luck!

im in no competition with anyone, i just wanna be able to help anyone who is working on quests… although i do prefer to help moparclassic foremost…

Read full topic

item.title: Quests and current developmant/information
item.dc:creator: @xrune xrune
item.description:
@xrune wrote:

I decided to make a single topic for quests… I think it would be valuable to those who want to work on quests or developers that are interested in the content… I would like to contribute to moparclassic, although im no java expert i understand the way quests work, so i have written them in my own way… I will be adding to this topic the more I get the information needed to complete the quests… Thanks to those who have supported me… Feel free to ask any questions about any quest… MY goal is to get all the information needed to make each individual quest and also possibly add some rs2 quests to runescape classic…

Update:**** GOT rune mysteries (rsc) complete/got all blanks ****
**** GOT prince ali rescue complete****

F2p Quests:
0)Tutorial Island-------------------------------------------------------------------------------- https://docs.google.com/document/d/14l97eiOxFusxsH4sGxWY9IRc4q8P6Ok8PMtwEyGJO94/edit?usp=sharing

2)Cooks Assistant------------------------------------------------------------------------------ See moparclassic
